about_the_game:
The nightmare has descended on the starship Starfarer ETOS-1. Dr. Carter, the crew's premier forensic pathologist, is woken from hibernation to investigate the mysterious death of a ground-crew member. Little does Dr. Carter know, but this death will set the grounds for all the horror that is to come.

As the infection spreads amongst the crew, turning them into grotesque, mindless versions of themselves, Dr. Carter finds that they are not driven to madness. Rather, they can harness the power of the parasite. This comes at a cost, however, as the use of these powers and further exposure to the parasite’s influence on board test not only their strength, but their will.

Armed with weapons from the safety-escort military group, Vaga-Corp, and their newfound powers, Dr. Carter must traverse the ship to aid laying the groundwork for a potential escape. But when the expedition is exposed as a myth, full of deceit, greed, and hidden agendas, it is no longer just those infected they must overcome, but also the enemy survivors who want nothing more than to please their own leader.

When the fate of the crew hangs in the balance between one tragedy or another, Dr. Carter must be the one who determines the fate of everyone on board.

Battle the hoards, resist the call, and uncover the truth of the sinister story behind Necrotic Nightmare.

key Features

  • Mow your way through the enemy hoards! This First-Person horror shooter experience places you directly at ground zero. Fight your way through the evolving enemies to liberate the Starfarer.

  • Harness the power! Progress your skill through combat to grow the arsenal of Dr. Carter’s newfound powers, aiding in new ways to take on the enemy!

  • Upgrade your arsenal! Gather upgrade materials through quest progression and salvaging to enhance your weapons and leveraging Dr. Carter’s skills to ensure survival.

  • Explore the Starfarer! As a home for the entire crew during the expedition, the Starfarer boasts a large, state-of-the-art vessel for Dr. Carter to explore.

  • Save the Survivors! Rescue your fellow crewmates from the nightmare overtaking the ship, each one crucial to the survival of those who managed to get to safety.


The voices are calling. Will you listen? Take on the hoard of parasite-infected crewmates in this sci-fi horror experience, Necrotic Nightmare.

content_descriptors.notes: Necrotic Nightmare puts you in the seat of a medical officer that fights against a parasitical organism that enters the victims' bodies and takes control of the victims' bodies. Longer the parasite remains in the victim, they will start growing and mutating the victim's body. You will have to manage the parasite that infected you during investigation with using medicine to keep it at bay. You will fight back against parasites on the ship and crew that have their own agenda.

Battle the hoards, defend the crew, resist the infection and uncover the truth in this first-person Sci-Fi horror shooter, harnessing powers, upgrading weapons, and battling to survive. The voices are calling you. Will you listen?
